Class AergoKey

  • java.lang.Object

    KeyPair, MessageSigner, Signer, TxSigner, TxVerifier

 @ApiStability.Unstable
public class AergoKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyPair, Signer, MessageSigner, TxVerifier
